title: The Kingdom Dead
description: The third installment of the Cajun Zombie Chronicles. Isherwood, Padre, and Monsignor encounter another group of survivors, led by an ancient black woman and woman with flaming red hair. Will they be enemies or join forces? Swarms of the dead descend on the fledgling kingdom and Padre has a messy idea to save bullets. The kingdom is also assailed by a new kind of human vermin and the town's airport rises from the dead. The last great human refuge - will it all be wiped off the map?
author: Scott L. Smith
